item.title: Destiny's Child - Bills,Bills,Bills
item.description:
At first
we started out
We’re cool
takin’ me
Places

item.description:
Remember the first day

Cause he told me so

item.description:

now that I need you

wherever you go

a river that

you never see me

over caught up

in my soul
But if you don’t
come back
Come home to me
darling
Don’t you know
there’s nobody
Left in this world
to hold me tight

there’s nobody

to kiss goodnight

goodnight
